00027 // Enum for the order/type of params in IntFeatDesc.
00028 enum IntParams {
00029   IntX,   // x-position (0-255).
00030   IntY,   // y-position (0-255).
00031   IntDir  // Direction (0-255, circular).
00032 };
00033 
00034 // Enum for the order/type of params in GeoFeatDesc.
00035 enum GeoParams {
00036   GeoBottom,   // Bounding box bottom in baseline space (0-255).
00037   GeoTop,      // Bounding box top in baseline space (0-255).
00038   GeoWidth,    // Bounding box width in baseline space (0-255).
00039 
00040   GeoCount     // Number of geo features.
00041 };
00042

00044 { PicoFeatY, PicoFeatDir, PicoFeatX }
